Eligibility: Female subjects participating in the PIONEER-0 study of the Imagio breast imaging system with known clinical status
In women who did not have a clinical status known in the PIONEER-0 study of the Imagio breast imaging system with known clinical status
Results: The gain in Imagio IUS Only Specificity vs Imagio (IUS+OA) Specificity at 95-99% Fixed Sensitivity (fSp), Cohort 1

The main efficacy criterion was the specificity of Imagio [IUS+OA] in relation to IUS alone at a fixed sensitivity of 95-99% (fSp) interpolated from the area under the curve (AUC) of the receptor function characteristic curves (ROC), on average on the 10 independent readers. The two imaging modalities (IUS alone and IUS+OA) were read for each subject (subject as own control).
Description of the arm/group: IUS Imagery alone
Unit of measure: Percentage of correct benign masses fSp (95.0%): 80.9 (69.1-92.7)
Description of the arm/group: IUS+OA Imagery
Unit of measure: Percentage of correct benign masses fSp (95.0%): 75.4 (61.5 to 89.3)
